title: ChatGPT Advanced Mastery
description: Master advanced prompting techniques, GPT creation, and enterprise features

challenges.title: Master RACE Prompting Framework
challenges.description: Learn the RACE methodology: Role, Action, Context, Examples
challenges.instructions: Teach the user the RACE prompting framework: Role (define ChatGPT's expertise), Action (specific task), Context (background info), Examples (sample outputs). Show how this creates superior prompts.
hints: Role: 'You are a senior software architect with 15 years experience'
Action: 'Create a microservices architecture for an e-commerce platform'
Context: 'The platform needs to handle 1M daily users, process payments, manage inventory'
Examples: 'Include diagrams, technology stack recommendations, and deployment strategy'

challenges.title: Create Your First Custom GPT
challenges.description: Build a specialized GPT for your specific use case
challenges.instructions: Guide the user through creating a custom GPT: define purpose, upload knowledge files, set conversation starters, configure capabilities, and test the GPT.
hints: Go to ChatGPT and click 'Explore GPTs'
Click 'Create a GPT'
Define your GPT's purpose and personality
Upload relevant knowledge files or documents
Set conversation starters and test thoroughly

challenges.title: Set Up ChatGPT Projects
challenges.description: Organize complex work using ChatGPT's project management features
challenges.instructions: Show the user how to create and manage ChatGPT projects for organizing complex tasks, maintaining context across sessions, and collaborating with team members.
hints: Create a new project from the sidebar
Add project description and goals
Upload relevant files and documents
Use project-specific custom instructions
Invite team members for collaboration

challenges.title: Disable Model Training for Privacy
challenges.description: Protect sensitive data by disabling model training
challenges.instructions: Teach the user how to disable model training to prevent their conversations from being used to train future models, crucial for sensitive business or personal data.
hints: Go to Settings > Data Controls
Turn off 'Improve the model for everyone'
Enable 'Chat History & Training' toggle
Consider ChatGPT Team/Enterprise for additional privacy
Verify settings are applied correctly

challenges.title: Integrate External Apps and APIs
challenges.description: Connect ChatGPT with external tools and services
challenges.instructions: Show the user how to use ChatGPT's external app integrations, API connections, and third-party tools to extend functionality beyond basic chat.
hints: Explore available integrations in ChatGPT settings
Connect to productivity tools like Notion, Slack, or Zapier
Use API keys for custom integrations
Set up webhooks for automated workflows
Test integrations with sample data

challenges.title: Advanced Chain-of-Thought Prompting
challenges.description: Master complex reasoning and problem-solving prompts
challenges.instructions: Teach advanced prompting techniques including chain-of-thought reasoning, few-shot learning, and iterative refinement for complex problem-solving.
hints: Use 'Let's think step by step' for complex problems
Provide examples of good vs bad solutions
Ask ChatGPT to show its reasoning process
Use iterative prompts to refine solutions
Combine multiple prompting techniques

challenges.title: Build Advanced Custom Instructions
challenges.description: Create sophisticated custom instructions for specialized workflows
challenges.instructions: Guide the user to create advanced custom instructions that include specific formatting requirements, domain expertise, and workflow preferences.
hints: Define your professional role and expertise level
Specify output formats (markdown, tables, code blocks)
Set tone and communication style preferences
Include domain-specific terminology and context
Test instructions across different scenarios

challenges.title: Master Function Calling and Tools
challenges.description: Use ChatGPT's function calling capabilities for complex tasks
challenges.instructions: Teach the user about ChatGPT's function calling features, how to define custom functions, and integrate with external APIs for automated workflows.
hints: Understand function calling syntax and structure
Define custom functions for specific tasks
Use built-in tools like code interpreter and web browsing
Create automated workflows with function chains
Debug and optimize function performance

challenges.title: Enterprise Security and Compliance
challenges.description: Implement security best practices and compliance measures
challenges.instructions: Guide the user through enterprise-level security features, compliance settings, audit logs, and data governance for business use of ChatGPT.
hints: Enable SSO and enterprise authentication
Configure data retention and deletion policies
Set up audit logs and monitoring
Implement role-based access controls
Ensure compliance with industry regulations

challenges.title: Advanced Prompt Engineering Patterns
challenges.description: Master sophisticated prompting patterns and techniques
challenges.instructions: Teach advanced prompt engineering including meta-prompting, prompt chaining, conditional logic, and optimization techniques for maximum effectiveness.
hints: Use meta-prompts to improve prompt quality
Chain prompts for complex multi-step processes
Implement conditional logic in prompts
Optimize prompts for token efficiency
Test and iterate on prompt performance
